        Returns:

      • getScorecardDonors

        public java.util.List<ScorecardNoUpdateDonor> getScorecardDonors(boolean toExlcude)
        Returns the list of Scorecard Donors
        Parameters:
        toExlcude -
        Returns:
        List , list with donors if toExclude param is true, the method will return all the donors except: - excluded donors - donors without activities in non-private WS if toExclude param is false, the method will return the no update donors

      • getFilteredDonors

      • getQuarters

        public java.util.List<Quarter> getQuarters(java.lang.String filteredQuartersAsString)
        Returns a list of all quarters that will span the donor scorecard. The start and end of the period is defined through Global Settings: START_YEAR_DEFAULT_VALUE and END_YEAR_DEFAULT_VALUE
        Returns:
        List, the list of the quarters that will represent the headers of the donor scorecard file.

      • getSettingsQuarters

        public java.util.List<Quarter> getSettingsQuarters()

        Returns the last past quarter
        Returns:
        Quarter, the last past quarter

      • getOrderedScorecardCells

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,ColoredCell>> getOrderedScorecardCells(java.util.List<ActivityUpdate> activityUpdates)
        Generates the Map> with the data of the ColoredCells that will be used to create the donor scorecard
        Parameters:
        activityUpdates - the List of all ActivityUpdates that took place during the period for which the scorecard will be generated.
        Returns:
        a Map> with all ColoredCells filled with the appropiate colors. For each quarter and donor there is a ColoredCell.

      • getLatestActivityIdsByDateQuery

        public java.lang.String getLatestActivityIdsByDateQuery(java.lang.String endPeriodDate)
        Gets the latest activity ids for all existing activity that were updated before the end of a quarter. We can have an activity that is 'on going' on Quarter 3 and 'completed' on quarter 4. In order to validate quarter 3 correctly we need to know which is the latest version of the activity that was updated before the quarter end and we should also omit updates and versions that happened after the end of the quarter.
        Parameters:
        endPeriodDate, - the end date of a quarter
        Returns:
        String query with the latest versions of activities

        public int getPastQuarterOrganizationsCount()
